      • getTileExpiration

        public long getTileExpiration​(int level,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Description copied from interface: TileContainer
        Returns the expiration date of the specified tile, in epoch milliseconds, or -1LL if the tile does not exist or expiration metadata is not available for this container.
        Specified by:
        getTileExpiration in interface TileContainer
        Parameters:
        level - The zoom level
        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row
        Returns:
        The expiration date of the specified tile, in epoch milliseconds, or -1LL if the tile does not exist or expiration metadata is not available for this container.

      • getTile

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getTile​(int zoom,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       java.lang.Throwable[] error)
        Description copied from interface: TileMatrix
        Returns the tile for the specified zoom level, tile row and tile column as a decoded Bitmap.
        Specified by:
        getTile in interface TileMatrix
        Parameters:
        zoom - The zoom level
        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row
        error - If non-null, returns the error that occurred when trying to obtain and decode the tile. This will be used for informational purposes only; implementations are not required to return a value.
        Returns:
        The decoded tile for the specified zoom, tile row and tile column, or null if there is no tile available or tile decode failed.

        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row
        error - If non-null, returns the error that occurred when trying to obtain and decode the tile. This will be used for informational purposes only; implementations are not required to return a value.
        Returns:
        The tile data for the specified zoom, tile row and tile column, or null if there is no tile available.

      • setTile

        public void setTile​(int level,
                    int x,
                    int y,
                    android.graphics.Bitmap data,
                    long expiration)
             throws TileEncodeException
        Description copied from interface: TileContainer
        Sets the data for the specified tile in the container.
        Specified by:
        setTile in interface TileContainer
        Parameters:
        level - The tile zoom level
        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row
        data - The tile data, as a Bitmap
        expiration - The expiration for the tile data, specified in epoch milliseconds (ignored if TileContainer.hasTileExpirationMetadata() returns false)
        Throws:
        TileEncodeException - If an error occurs while encoding the tile data into a serialized representation.

      • getBounds

        public Envelope getBounds()
        Description copied from interface: TileMatrix
        Returns the minimum bounding box of the data containing region per the native spatial reference of the content.

        Note that the returned value may not snap to the tile grid.

        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface TileMatrix
        Returns:
        See Also:
